price: “Bugün ölümü bir kere değil, birçok kere temenni edin!” (denilecek).
arabic: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tadʿū al-yawma thubūran wāḥidan wa-id'ʿū thubūran kathīran
